member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability
member.summary: Flags describing the behavioural capabilities a plugin exposes to the host.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.ProvidesIndexer
member.summary: A searchable indexer is provided.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.ProvidesDownloadClient
member.summary: A download client is provided.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsCaching
member.summary: Plugin implements caching for upstream requests.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsAuthentication
member.summary: Plugin performs authentication (OAuth, API keys, etc.).

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsQualitySelection
member.summary: Plugin allows the caller to select between multiple qualities or formats.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsOAuth
member.summary: Plugin can complete OAuth 2.0 authorization-code flows.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsDeviceCode
member.summary: Plugin supports OAuth 2.0 device code or similar out-of-band flows.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsHiResAudio
member.summary: Plugin can deliver hi-res / lossless audio variants.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsTrackPreviews
member.summary: Plugin can provide short playback previews for tracks.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsBatchDownloads
member.summary: Plugin can orchestrate batched / queued downloads efficiently.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsRegionalCatalogs
member.summary: Plugin is aware of regional catalog variants and can target specific markets.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsIsrcSearch
member.summary: Plugin supports lookup by ISRC.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsUpcSearch
member.summary: Plugin supports lookup by UPC / EAN.

member.name: F:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability.SupportsPlaylists
member.summary: Plugin can surface curated or user playlists.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions
member.summary: Helper utilities for converting between manifest capability strings and strongly typed flags.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions.ToManifestValues(Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability)
member.summary: Converts a set of capability flags into manifest string values.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions.FromManifestValues(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.String}@)
member.summary: Converts manifest string values into capability flags.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions.ToDisplayNames(Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability)
member.summary: Converts capability flags into display names suitable for human readable views.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions.HasCapability(Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability,Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability)
member.summary: Checks if the capability set contains the requested flag.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapabilityExtensions.TryParse(System.String,Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Capabilities.PluginCapability@)
member.summary: Attempts to map a manifest value to a capability flag.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient
member.summary: Contract for host-managed download orchestration.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient.InitializeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Performs any network or authentication initialization required before handling requests.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient.EnqueueAlbumDownloadAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queues a download for the specified album and returns a host-visible identifier.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient.RemoveDownloadAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Attempts to remove an existing download from the queue.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient.GetActiveDownloadsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a snapshot of all active downloads.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IDownloadClient.GetDownloadAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the state for a single download, or null if none exists.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer
member.summary: Contract for exposing search/indexing capabilities to the host. All models must come from Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions to guarantee cross-ALC compatibility.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.InitializeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Performs any network or authentication initialization required before handling requests.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.SearchAlbumsAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a query returning albums. Plugins may return an empty collection when no matches are found.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.SearchTracksAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a query returning tracks.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.GetAlbumAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves a single album by its provider identifier.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.SearchAlbumsStreamAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Streams album results lazily. Hosts may fall back to when not implemented.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IIndexer.SearchTracksStreamAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Streams track results lazily. Hosts may fall back to when not implemented.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin
member.summary: Entry point implemented by every Lidarr streaming plugin.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin.Manifest
member.summary: Manifest metadata describing the plugin.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin.InitializeAsync(Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPluginContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Initializes plugin-wide resources. Invoked once per AssemblyLoadContext instance.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin.CreateIndexerAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates an indexer instance if supported, otherwise returns null.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin.CreateDownloadClientAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a download client instance if supported, otherwise returns null.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPlugin.SettingsProvider
member.summary: Provides access to settings operations. Must never return null.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPluginContext
member.summary: Services exposed by the host to a plugin instance.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPluginContext.HostVersion
member.summary: Host semantic version (e.g. Lidarr version).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPluginContext.LoggerFactory
member.summary: Logger factory shared between host and plugin. Always shared from the default AssemblyLoadContext.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.IPluginContext.Services
member.summary: Optional service provider for host supplied services (must only expose types coming from Abstractions).

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.ISettingsProvider
member.summary: Manages plugin configuration that must remain private to the plugin AssemblyLoadContext. All interactions use plain dictionaries to avoid leaking plugin-specific types into the host.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.ISettingsProvider.Describe
member.summary: Returns strongly-typed metadata about the plugin settings for UI consumption.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.ISettingsProvider.GetDefaults
member.summary: Returns default settings payload.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.ISettingsProvider.Validate(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Validates settings without mutating plugin state.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.ISettingsProvider.Apply(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Applies settings to the plugin.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.SettingDefinition
member.summary: Metadata describing an individual plugin setting field.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Contracts.PluginValidationResult
member.summary: Lightweight validation result used when exchanging settings or capability checks across the host boundary.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.DefaultPluginContext
member.summary: Minimal implementation of suitable for tests and simple hosts.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginHandle
member.summary: Wraps a plugin instance together with its AssemblyLoadContext for convenient cleanup.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadContext
member.summary: AssemblyLoadContext implementation that isolates a plugin and its dependency graph while sharing contract assemblies with the host.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoader
member.summary: Utility helpers for loading plugins into isolated AssemblyLoadContexts.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest
member.summary: Parameters required to load a plugin into an isolated AssemblyLoadContext.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest.PluginDirectory
member.summary: Path to the root directory containing plugin.json and the main assembly.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest.PluginAssemblyFile
member.summary: Filename of the plugin assembly (defaults to manifest entryAssembly or {id}.dll).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest.SharedAssemblies
member.summary: Versions of assemblies that should be shared with the host (defaults to Abstractions + Logging).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest.HostVersion
member.summary: Host semantic version for compatibility checks.

member.summary: Version of Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions loaded in the host.

member.summary: Host-provided plugin context implementation.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Hosting.PluginLoadRequest.Manifest
member.summary: Optional manifest override when already parsed.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginCompatibilityResult
member.summary: Result of comparing a plugin manifest against the host environment.

member.summary: True when the plugin may be safely loaded.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginCompatibilityResult.Message
member.summary: Diagnostic message explaining incompatibility or additional info.

member.name: T:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest
member.summary: Immutable description of a Lidarr streaming plugin as declared in plugin.json. The host uses this to evaluate compatibility before loading the plugin AssemblyLoadContext.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier for the plugin (stable across versions).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Name
member.summary: Human friendly plugin name.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Version
member.summary: Semantic version of the plugin package.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.ApiVersion
member.summary: Supported Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions major version expressed as "1.x".

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.CommonVersion
member.summary: Version of Lidarr.Plugin.Common that ships with the plugin (diagnostic only).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.MinHostVersion
member.summary: Minimum host version required (optional).

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Description
member.summary: Optional friendly description for UIs.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Author
member.summary: Plugin author attribution.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.Capabilities
member.summary: Optional list of features/capabilities implemented by the plugin.

member.summary: Required settings keys that the host must provide.

member.name: P:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.EntryAssembly
member.summary: Optional assembly name that contains the plugin entry-point.

member.summary: Loads and parses plugin.json from disk.

member.summary: Parses plugin.json from a JSON payload.

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.ToJson
member.summary: Serialises the manifest back to JSON (useful for tooling/tests).

member.name: M:Lidarr.Plugin.Abstractions.Manifest.PluginManifest.EnsureValid
member.summary: Validates the manifest fields and returns the original instance when valid. Throws when validation fails.

member.summary: Checks whether the manifest is compatible with the provided host + abstractions versions.
